title: Amirul Ikmal Hafiz
summary: Amirul Ikmal bin Hafiz (born 17 January 1996) is a Malaysian professional footballer who plays as a defender for Kuala Lumpur.
content:
Amirul Ikmal bin Hafiz (born 17 January 1996) is a Malaysian professional footballer who plays as a defender for Kuala Lumpur.


== Career ==
Amirul made five appearances for Malaysia-based Harimau Muda B in the 2015 S.League, with his professional debut arriving on 23 April versus Hougang United. In 2016, Amirul joined Malaysian side Kuala Lumpur.Hafiz was called up to a Malaysian under-22 training camp in 2016.


== Career statistics ==
As of 1 August 2018.
